title.rendered: Artridox– 60 Capsules Improves Heart Health & Cardiovascular Health

content.rendered:
• ARTRIDOX is a specially formulated food supplement designed to support cardiovascular health and enhance blood circulation. With its unique blend of 100% stabilized Allicin and other potent ingredients, ARTRIDOX helps improve red blood cell function, reduces heart stress, and promote heart health.

Key Benefits:

  • Supports Cardiovascular Health: May help improve red blood cell function and reduces the risk of heart disease and stroke.
  • Enhances Blood Circulation: Stimulates blood circulation, may help to improve heart function and overall well-being.
  • Reduces Heart Stress: Users may experience significant reductions in heart stress levels, heart rate, and other cardiovascular indicators within minutes of use.
  • Improves Blood Function: May Improve Dynamic Diastolic Index (DDI) and Endothelial Efficiency Index (EEI) to support optimal heart and vascular health.
  • May help slow the aging process of arteries.
  • Ideal for those seeking heart health support and enhanced vascular function.

Direction of use

  • Take 1-2 capsules daily with a meal.
  • Or as directed by your health care physician.
  • Daily intake must not exceed 4 capsules.
  • Women who are pregnant should check with their health provider before using.

Suitable for: Adults of 16 years and over.

Ingredients: Active ingredients – Allicin Extract (garlic bulb) Green Tea Extract, Pumpkin Seed Powder, Amla Extract, Excipients.

Legal Disclaimer: This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
